nl.corebooster.scenes

Class GameScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.scenes.GameScene

  • public class GameScene
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a game scene with the standard features
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug

        sceneName - The name of the scene

        playerY - The players initial y-position
